channel.title: HQ on Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in HQ on Hugo Site

item.title: Daily List
item.description: Find Dentist Weekday Errands: Get Nick and Dani to visit UC room Saturday Errands: USPS, Morning Move out: Saturday, Pack everything. Sunday, 12pm pick up. Go to Texas Roadhouse and other places. Drop stuff off at Stephon’s. UC Storage Program Complaints Not accessible No insurance Find Adam a watch (Go to Swiss Watchmakes pass Felipe’s?) “If I loved you less, I might be able to talk about it more.

item.title: Short List
item.description: BGS as an entity? Cases: Uncle: Employment Danjuan: Passport/AIDT Stamp Meidan: Verizon and Capitol One Emails: Contact Ben about drone equipment Contact Rachel about nectar funding for bike Major Taxes for ad (set for next year, IT-201 plus 1040, plus education credits from Kevin) SEAS CAD Drill Bit Drawer Wrench Drawer Summer Smorgasbord CHEM S-1AB SEAS internship UC Interlock Animation Writing/World Building/Composing/Animating Build drone w/Kian and PS70 Documentation Other than Joy To Do List Create and update inventory spreadsheet for Adams HoCo Figure out Treasurer stuff for PRIMUS Get back on the UC stuff Attack Kian with drone Remember to apply for Boeing intership Jumpstart Interlock again, find program and funding Define documentation for Stephon Define CAD engine for Saba File for Nectar funding Summer To-Do List Go to Primark w/Saba More mundane to-do list Figure out Amazon glitch w/Saba Email Katia about ES128 Do LSAT stuff w/Adam Train to beat up Adam Misc Susana’s Birthday (Aug 15), buy her a book.

item.title: Long List
item.description: Things coming up Eat stuff w/Grace and her crew before classes start in the fall Explore places w/Kian at some point in semester Show Giulia around campus Academic Stuff Saba’s spreadsheet Architecture? EC (EC10a/EC1010a/Ec1011a) or STAT (104/110) class? Clubs HRSFA/HAPIE Quidditch UC SEDS? PRIMUS HCEA/HCER? HURC? Archery IM Rep Utilities/Bills Pay off balances (11th of each month) Electricity/WiFi on auto Water (Remind mom to send before 20th of each month) Payment Link Check Payment History Tango: $5.

item.title: Respond
item.description: Avery (Discord) David Vice (Phone call) Giulia (Text, ask for zoom call?) Madi (Before Jun.19) Jacob (Write letter) Stephon (Take a walk + finish letter) Thor (Discord) Dani (On Campus) Tramy and Havi (Facetime) Rotation: Saba Lara BGS Grace Ask Diego if the Unreal Engine can be used for animation Monday (Hollis) Tuesday (Susana, around 8pm) Wednesday (Work) Insults for Adam: “You can always be used as a bad example.

item.title: Protocols
item.description: General protocols John Oliver on Monday evenings 20min Reddit/Facebook/Twitter/Youtube 30min allowance Reddit/Facebook/Twitter/Youtube, John Oliver on Monday evenings Call 1-2 people everyday, 30min-1hr on the bridge When I stop breaking down my day, contact Leo because my scheduling system is broken. Projects Graduate college and maybe go to grad school Write Magnum Opus UC Interlock Animation Saba conditionals Don’t talk about her hair Don’t say slurs Don’t be stupid Adam Conditionals
